name: The Ritz-Carlton
intro: The Ritz-Carlton is a globally renowned luxury hotel brand, celebrated for its exceptional service and refined hospitality experience. Known for its timeless elegance and sophisticated design, the hotel seamlessly blends modern amenities with classic luxury, offering guests unparalleled comfort and indulgence. Whether for business or leisure, The Ritz-Carlton caters to every guest's needs, creating unforgettable stays.

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: “This is A great hotel to live in, but it doesn't have AC”

reviews.name: Kate
reviews.comment: “This is A suck hotel to live in, but it doesn't have AC”

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: “This is a hotel on average to live in, but it doesn't have AC”

address: 2 Chome-5-25 Umeda, Kita Ward, Osaka, Japan
cancellation_Policy: Cancellation 7 days or more before check-in: Free cancellation, full refund.Cancellation 3 to 6 days before check-in: 30% of the accommodation fee will be charged as a cancellation fee.Cancellation 1 to 2 days before check-in: 50% of the accommodation fee will be charged as a cancellation fee.Same-day cancellation or no-show: 100% of the accommodation fee will be charged as a cancellation fee.Please note that special promotions or specific room types may have different cancellation policies. For details, please refer to your booking confirmation or contact the hotel directly.
transportation: About a 5-min walk from Bus Station
